languages.text: "Не сказала бы, что эти самодельные сетеметы значительно лучше пустых рук, но... До окончания зачистки каждый блюститель будет иметь при себе боевой нож для распиливания сетей".

"I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."
languages.original_text: "Не сказала бы, что эти самодельные сетеметы значительно лучше пустых рук, но... До окончания зачистки каждый блюститель будет иметь при себе боевой нож для распиливания сетей".

traits.locale_text: "I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... Until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."

"I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."

languages.text: «No diría que estos lanzarredes improvisados son una gran alternativa a luchar con las manos desnudas, pero... hasta que terminemos con la limpieza, todos los guardias llevarán una filoarma para cortar redes».
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."

traits.locale_text: «No diría que estos lanzarredes improvisados son una gran alternativa a luchar con las manos desnudas, pero... hasta que terminemos con la limpieza, todos los guardias llevarán una filoarma para cortar redes».

languages.text: 「この即席ウェバーは、素手で戦うよりずっといいとは言えません。ですが…後片付けが終わるまで、全エンフォーサーが網を切りやすいコンバットナイフを携帯することになりますね」
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."

traits.locale_text: 「この即席ウェバーは、素手で戦うよりずっといいとは言えません。ですが…後片付けが終わるまで、全エンフォーサーが網を切りやすいコンバットナイフを携帯することになりますね」

languages.text: “这些捕网枪都是临时拼凑的，效果比徒手战斗好不到哪去，不过……除非我们把清理工作全都做完，否则每位执法者在战斗的时候，都不得不随身携带用来割网的战斗刀。”
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."

traits.locale_text: “这些捕网枪都是临时拼凑的，效果比徒手战斗好不到哪去，不过……除非我们把清理工作全都做完，否则每位执法者在战斗的时候，都不得不随身携带用来割网的战斗刀。”

languages.text: "Diese improvisierten Netzwerfer sind kaum besser, als mit bloßen Händen zu kämpfen, doch ... Bis wir mit dem Aufräumen fertig sind, wird jeder Enforcer mit einem Kampfmesser ausgestattet, mit dem sich Netze durchtrennen lassen."
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."

traits.locale_text: "Diese improvisierten Netzwerfer sind kaum besser, als mit bloßen Händen zu kämpfen, doch ... Bis wir mit dem Aufräumen fertig sind, wird jeder Enforcer mit einem Kampfmesser ausgestattet, mit dem sich Netze durchtrennen lassen."

languages.text: « Je doute fort que ces lance-toiles improvisés soient plus efficaces qu'un bon coup de poing, mais... En attendant que nous ayons fait le ménage, tous les prévôts devront s'équiper d'un couteau de combat capable de trancher les mailles d'un filet. »
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."

traits.locale_text: « Je doute fort que ces lance-toiles improvisés soient plus efficaces qu'un bon coup de poing, mais... En attendant que nous ayons fait le ménage, tous les prévôts devront s'équiper d'un couteau de combat capable de trancher les mailles d'un filet. »

languages.text: "Bu el yapımı ağdolayanların çıplak elle dövüşmekten çok daha iyi olduğunu söyleyemem ama... Biz ortalığı temizleyene kadar her bir infazcının elinde ağları kesmeye uygun bir savaş bıçağı olacak."
languages.original_text: "I wouldn't say that these improvised webbers are that much better than fighting with bare hands, but... until we are done with the clean-up, every enforcer will carry a combat knife fit for cutting through nets."
